main.name: Filipe Pires
main.description: I am proactive, communicative and humorous. I like new challenges and always be learning more
main.bio: I have been working with application development for almost 2 years, I use react native, using redux and redux-saga to make requests to API's. For styling, I usually use styled-components and the appcenter (or fastlane) for the application's CI/CD. I also have some experience with Node and non-relational databases like mongodb

resume.skillmessage: Working for almost 2 years with mobile application development

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
